problem.title: Sound Familiar?
problem.subtitle: You're not alone. Thousands of e-commerce sellers face these challenges daily:

items.title: 10+ Hours/Week Wasted
items.description: Manually syncing products across Shopify, Amazon, eBay, Etsy. Copy-paste hell.

items.title: Spreadsheet Chaos
items.description: Managing 1000+ products in Excel. Formulas break, versions conflict, data gets lost.

items.title: Multi-Channel Nightmare
items.description: Product data inconsistent across channels. Different images, prices, descriptions everywhere.

items.title: Variation Hell
items.description: Size/color matrices are impossible in spreadsheets. 100 variants = 100 headaches.

items.title: Image Management Disaster
items.description: 5,000+ product images in random folders. No naming convention, no organization.

items.title: Team Collaboration Broken
items.description: Multiple people editing the same spreadsheet. Conflicts, overwrites, lost work.
